content.1: The words of Nehemiah the son of Hachaliah. And it came to pass in the month Chisleu, in the twentieth year, as I was in Shushan the palace,
content.2: That Hanani, one of my brethren, came, he and
content.3: And they said unto me, The remnant that are left of the captivity there in the province
content.4: And it came to pass, when I heard these words, that I sat down and wept, and mourned
content.5: And said, I beseech thee, O
content.6: Let thine ear now be attentive, and thine eyes open, that thou mayest hear the prayer of thy servant, which I pray before thee now, day and night, for the children of Israel thy servants, and confess the sins of the children of Israel, which we have sinned against thee: both I and my father’s house have sinned.
content.7: We have dealt very corruptly against thee, and have not kept the commandments, nor the statutes, nor the judgments, which thou commandedst thy servant Moses.
content.8: Remember, I beseech thee, the word that thou commandedst thy servant Moses, saying,
content.11: O Lord, I beseech thee, let now thine ear be attentive to the prayer of thy servant, and to the prayer of thy servants, who desire to fear thy name: and prosper, I pray thee, thy servant this day, and grant him mercy in the sight of this man. For I was the king’s cupbearer.
